name: TASKRABBIT
description: Platform for household errands and skilled tasks
sampleDescriptions: Educate policymakers on TaskRabbit and its business model; monitor workforce policy issues; monitor H.R. 2685 / S. 1251, the Portable Benefits for Independent Workers Pilot Program Act.
